'''Calx's Arts''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If the active character is only missing one Energy and both inactive characters have at least one Energy, then this card will drain one energy from both inactive characters and give the active character only one Energy, for a net loss of one Energy.
